IP address       HW type     Flags       HW address            Mask     Device
192.168.0.1      0x1         0x2         00:aa:22:bb:33:cc     *        eth0
192.168.0.2      0x1         0x2         11:bb:33:cc:44:dd     *        eth0
192.168.0.3      0x1         0x2         22:cc:44:dd:55:ee     *        eth0
192.168.0.4      0x1         0x2         33:dd:55:ee:66:ff     *        eth1
192.168.0.5      0x1         0x2         44:ee:66:ff:77:aa     *        eth1
192.168.0.6      0x1         0x2         55:ff:77:aa:88:bb     *        eth1
